title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When the actual servlet is invoked during an async dispatch, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener does not match the DispatchType returned in the filter/servlet.
EB: When the actual servlet is invoked, the DispatchType is correctly set to ASYNC. However, the DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener is not updated to match the value returned in the filter/servlet.
SR: The DispatchType in the ServletRequestListener should be updated to match the DispatchType returned in the filter/servlet for each dispatch during async processing.
